answers.answer: What is it and when do you have it?

It's to check to see if you have gestational diabetes. You first take an hour one, but i didn't pass it. that's why i had to take the 3 hour one. You drink this sugary drink and the an hour later they draw blood from you. The 3 hour one you have to fast, they draw your blood first and drink the sugary drink again , then after an hour they draw blood and again after another hour has passed.they do this when you're at 28 weeks

I had to do it with my first pregnancy and the results were borderline.  It does make you feel crappy. That is why this pregnancy I am resorting to checking my blood glucose with a meter for how ever many weeks instead of subjecting myself to that test. Another one of my friends dud this and her on was fine with it. My daughter is also a type 1 diabetic so we already have the supplies. Good luck on the results. Drink lots of water and rest today.
*another one of my friends did it and her OB was fine with it* sorry for the typos!
Yup and I had gestational diabetes

question: So I completed my 3 hour glucose test this morning, and I did pretty good. Won't know the results till Monday. Did any of you who has took this test feel run down and a little sick when you got home? I feel like I have no energy , and feel sick a little.
title: 3 hour glucose test
